name: Checkr
headline: People infrastructure for the future of work
description: Checkr builds people infrastructure for the future of work. And we believe everyone should have a fair chance to work. That's why we've designed a faster—and fairer—way to screen job seekers. For more information on our mission and products, visit http://checkr.com.
tags: industry:compliance; industry:hr-tech; industry:api; industry:enterprise-software; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Daniel Yanisse, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Worked as a software engineer in a few startups before starting Checkr in 2014.

generated_description:
Checkr is a cutting-edge company founded in 2014 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S14, located in the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco. Their mission is centered on creating "people infrastructure for the future of work," and a fundamental belief that everyone deserves a fair shot at employment. They aim to revolutionize hiring processes with a faster and fairer way of screening job seekers.

With a dedicated team of around 800 employees, Checkr offers a comprehensive suite of services primarily revolving around background checks and employment verification. Their products include:

1. **ENGAGE**: Tools such as a Candidate Portal and Candidate Stories aimed at improving applicant experiences.
2. **VERIFY**: A broad range of background checks, including criminal records, employment verification, driving records, drug testing, education verification, and international checks among others.
3. **DECIDE**: Tools for adjudication and assessment, helping businesses make informed hiring decisions.
4. **MANAGE**: Solutions that include payment processing, analytics, and continuous checks to ensure ongoing compliance and safety.

The company serves various industries including gig and marketplace, staffing, hospitality, retail, healthcare, and technology, catering to both small businesses and enterprise-level clients. Their technology boasts features like an AI-powered core, compliance tools, and a flexible API for easy integration with existing HR systems.

Checkr is consistently ranked highly for customer satisfaction and returns on investment, boasting a 169% ROI documented by Forrester. Their customer base includes notable companies such as Lyft, Kimpton Hotels, and Covenant Health, which speak to the efficacy and reliability of their background check services.

In a nutshell, Checkr is not just another HR tech company; it’s a forward-thinking platform that leverages technology to enhance the hiring process, ensure compliance, and support the future workforce. If you're interested in learning more about Checkr or looking to streamline your hiring processes, visit their website at [Checkr.com](http://www.checkr.com).
